page.title: 11 Transport
page.content: Out of 45 children we interviewed: in 38 cases one of their parents drove to work every weekday, 5 walked and 2 caught a bus. We found out that 28 of these people work in Exeter, 8 work in Silverton, 2 travel outside of Devon. Only 3 people worked in Tiverton and one each in Stoke Canon, Broadclyst and Cullompton. Silverton is fortunate because the Exeter to Tiverton bus service runs through the village. The route starts in Exeter, runs through Stoke Canon, Rewe, Thorverton, Bickleigh, Silverton and ends at Tiverton. Fourteen buses use this route a day. The earliest bus from Tiverton is 0838 and the latest is 2313. The earliest from Silverton is 0815 and the latest bus is at 2250. The earliest bus from Exeter is 0737 and the latest is 2220.
